body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_compat.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_compat.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_converter.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_converter.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_core.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_core.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_misc.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_misc.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_style.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_style.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_timeseries.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_timeseries.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/plotting/_tools.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/plotting/_tools.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/conftest.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/conftest.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_fiscal.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_fiscal.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets_properties.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets_properties.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_ticks.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_ticks.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_yqm_offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_yqm_offsets.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/test_frequencies.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/test_frequencies.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/test_holiday.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/0a6f5b009ecf09150f63bfafa87286034e3f21e8/pandas/tests/tseries/test_holiday.py) !
where is the suppressed DeprecationWarning coming from?
I'm pretty sure its because we are importing _timelex in tslibs.parsing

> I'm pretty sure its because we are importing _timelex in tslibs.parsing

oh that one. yeah we have an issue for that. We should leave the deprecation warning and fix it instead.
